venue.address_2: Third floor of the Jefferson Academic Center, at the corner of Main and Downing streets
venue.name: Cinema 320 at Clark

item.description:
Â 

I'm going to be heading straight from an unrelated happy hour to this showing, so anyone who's in the mood - come meet me! This is a documentary by Werner Herzog, a living legend in the medium.

http://cinema320.com/

http://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/happy_people_a_year_in_the_taiga/

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1683876/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1

I'll try to arrive between 7:00 and 7:15 so we can chit chat a bit before the lights drop. I've been here once and it's an extremely cool room! And only $6!

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Happy People: A Year In The Taiga @ Cinema 320 (Clark U.)
